stack:stack.stack:description:
This file "includes" the file /tmp/bootloader.xml that will be created during the install by /opt/stack/bin/output-bootloader.py -- the source for output-bootloader.py can be found in:
../../frontend/src/images/common/sles-stacki.img-patches/opt/stack/bin/output-bootloader.py
